name: EverQuest II: Echoes of Faydwer
description:
EverQuest II: Echoes of Faydwer is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Sony Online Entertainment. It was originally released in 2006. It was published by Sony Interactive Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play EverQuest II: Echoes of Faydwer on PC.
